Synopsis: Hope (Heather Graham) moves to Los Angeles in order to become a singer. She meets Will (Jeremy Sisto), and the two begin dating. But when Will gets Hope hooked on drugs and the relationship turns abusive, she decides she needs to leave him. Hope is determined to get her life back on track, continue pursuing her dreams and forget her ex-lover. Will, however, is dangerously unstable, and he intends to stop Hope from moving ahead, even if it means murdering her.
Title: Broken
